name: Beat The Heat (Mitchell Garrett, Scyrdan)
description:
Overview

Your ship crash-landed on an inhospitable, lava-covered world. On re-entry several of your essential ship components detached and were scattered across the planet. Unable to leave the ship yourself, you must use the few asteroid mining robots you have left to recover the parts, refuel your ship, and blast off to safety!

Controls

Hover over an object to see details about it.
Left-click to select a Drone.
Right-click with a Drone selected to move or interact.

-Tanker Drones can refuel other Drones.
-Mining Drones can mine resources.
-Excavator Drones can build other Drones and also pick up Ship Components.
-All Drones can refuel at the Mothership.

Once all components and have been retrieved and the Mothership is refueled you can blast off to safety!

Camera Controls

WASD to translate camera

Shift to speed up camera

Control to slow down camera

Middle-click to pan camera

Right-click to rotate camera
